channel.title: Comments on: AIP Chicken Nuggets with Banana Ketchup

item.title: By: Emily Thompson
item.dc:creator: Emily Thompson
item.description: Thank you so much for this recipe - I was pleasantly surprised at just how good they were! I also added garlic and onion powder to the ground chicken. I’m excited to use the leftover dip for other things!
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for this recipe – I was pleasantly surprised at just how good they were! I also added garlic and onion powder to the ground chicken. I’m excited to use the leftover dip for other things!

item.title: By: Kristin
item.dc:creator: Kristin
item.description: I can't believe how AMAZING these nuggets are and that they are actually AIP!! And who would have thought a banana ketchup is possible but this sauce is so good. It is definitely going to be in my monthly rotation. Thanks for the recipe!
item.content:encoded: I can’t believe how AMAZING these nuggets are and that they are actually AIP!! And who would have thought a banana ketchup is possible but this sauce is so good. It is definitely going to be in my monthly rotation. Thanks for the recipe!
